cause.description:
Every five minutes someone in the United States learns that he or she has leukemia, lymphoma, or myeloma – more than 300 people a day. Every ten minutes a child or adult is expected to die from blood-related cancers. This statistics represents six people every hour. Team in Training supports The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society. Since 1988, Team in Training athletes have raised more than $750 million, and we are seeing results – 25 years ago only 4% of children with leukemia survived, today 85% survive. We need to give that other 15% that same chance at life. What if that 15% included your child or loved one? Our fight is not over! The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society is dedicated to curing leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin lymphoma, and myeloma while improving the quality of life of patients and their families.
Donate here: http://www.active.com/donate/tntgmo/HSteppe
1. raise awareness and cure Leukemia
